text: The Fury is a 1978 American supernatural thriller movie directed by Brian De Palma and based on the 1976 novel of the same name by John Farris. It stars Kirk Douglas, Amy Irving, John Cassavetes, Carrie Snodgress, Charles Durning, Dennis Franz, Daryl Hannah and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1978 thriller movies Category:1978 science fiction movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:American thriller movies Category:Movies directed by Brian De Palma
title: The Fury (1978 movie)
